column5: Thanks for the heads up I thought it wasnt coming out until this fall.  D
You know.......sometimes you guys get these series later then we do for some stupid reason....

Looking forward to seeing it. It will air later on the Canadian History Channel, but what can you do.... Would have been nice if the reporter did a little fact checking though, or did they move Thunder Bay down to Lake O while I was sleeping?
Unfortanely it is the fall up here, just checked tonight.  But extreme Treasure Hnuter is on tonight, a fantastic show!!
I watched it last night......IMHO you guys didn't miss anything......MAYBE it will get better as the episodes unfold....but I doubt it.
Agreed , i stopped on it for a few and ended up surfing for something better.....i think i landed on "The First 48" lol
